Renvoi.definition: the reference of a matter involving a conflict of laws to the law of the foreign jurisdiction involved including reference to the jurisdiction's rules governing conflicts of laws compare whole law
Renvoi.origin: [French, act of sending back, reference, from Middle French, from renvoyer to send back]

1.1: the reference of a matter involving a conflict of laws to the law of the foreign jurisdiction involved including reference to the jurisdiction's rules governing conflicts of laws compare
